typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(input(
		empid as string,
		employeename as string,
		designation as string,
		managerid as string,
		dateofbirth as string,
		salary as string,
		commission as string,
		deptno as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		empid = Column_1,
		employeename = Column_2,
		designation = Column_3,
		managerid = Column_4,
		dateofbirth = Column_5,
		salary = Column_6,
		commission = Column_7,
		deptno = Column_8
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
